titles.title: Summary of gas and sublimates analyses from Klyuchevskoy group volcanoes in 1939

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This is a brief summary of gas analyses by I.Z. Ivanov of Kamchatka region volcanoes from 1939. Gas analyses were taken from four Klyuchevskoy volcano subsidiary craters: Tuyla, Biloikai, Tiranis and Kirgurich. Chemical composition of the gas analyses for 1939 for each volcano are presented as minimum and maximum values. Gas sublimates are reported simply as detects (DT).
volatiles, volcanic gas, fumarole gas, volcanoes, vapor condensates, sublimates

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Russia, Kamchatka, Klyuchevskaya, Klyuchev, Klyuchevskoy, Tiranis Crater, Tiranis Crater, Biloikai Crater, Kirgurich Volcano
